projects: [{"title":"A Next.js Authentication starter template","description":"A Next.js Authentication starter template (password reset, email validation and oAuth). Includes Stack Auth, MongoDB, Lemon Squeezy, tailwindcss and shadcn-ui"},{"title":"MacOS Clone","description":"This project is a macOS clone built using React and TypeScript with the aim of recreating the familiar and intuitive user interface of macOS within a web application. Leveraging React's component-based architecture, TypeScript's type safety, and the sleek design of macOS, the application delivers a seamless and responsive user experience. Users can interact with macOS-like windows, menus, and toolbars, offering cross-platform compatibility and the convenience of a familiar operating system directly in their web browser. The project showcases various features, including a weather app with geolocation-based forecasts, a wallpaper selection window for switching desktop backgrounds, a custom context menu, and a system navigation bar. Smooth animations are incorporated using Framer Motion, enhancing the overall user experience. The motivation behind this project is to provide users with a web application that offers the usability and productivity-enhancing features of macOS. The project is open to contributions, and the developer welcomes collaboration to add or enhance features. It is important to note that all rights to images, products, and names used in this project belong to Apple Inc., and it is utilized solely for educational purposes."}]
